trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Bel Air
There were no other sightings in Bel Air on or around January 22nd 2009
divs: Sighting Detailstwo nights in a row, returning home from work. Trianguliar patern of lights, trianguliar. Odd color, pulsing but not blinking unlike plane lights. No noise, accompynied by other set of lights. Mostly continious triangle pattern. Noticed because it was a consistant shape and spacing, not normal looking like a plane, no noise, just out of the ordinary. Looked exactly like a lot of trianguliar light ufo vids i have seen over the past few years. moved slowly away fom us as we traveled home, heading north west. Just felt it was not normal and had never seen this type of thing, not like a plane, or copter, quiet and very large pattern. Changed angle of view to us but always some sort of trianguliar shape. Had several individual lights flying with it.
Summary: Three lights not typical in flight or color, changing color range, intensity, accompanied by other lights, no noise, mostly triangular.
